title: Travel Website
shortDescription: A fully customized travel website with booking integration and destination management.
description:
We developed a complete travel booking solution for Applause Kashmir, a premium travel service provider. The platform features:

  • Custom tour packages with dynamic pricing
  • Online booking system with secure payment integration
  • Destination and itinerary management tools
  • User-friendly inquiry and contact system
  • Responsive design optimized for all devices

title: Mobile ecommerce App
shortDescription: Mobile app for ordering authentic Kashmiri products like Pashmina, handicrafts, and more.
description:
This mobile app was designed to bring the beauty of Kashmiri craftsmanship to users' fingertips. Ideal for Android and iOS, it allows customers to browse and order traditional products with ease. Key features include:

  • Curated catalog of Pashmina, handmade crafts, and regional specialties
  • Product filtering by category, price, and material
  • Secure checkout with multiple payment options
  • Order tracking and delivery status updates
  • Push notifications for new arrivals and offers

title: GestHouse Webiste
shortDescription: A tailored travel website for Applause Kashmir with booking features and curated tour packages.
description:
The Applause Kashmir website offers travelers a seamless way to explore and book experiences across Kashmir. Key features include:

  • Detailed tour packages with pricing and itinerary
  • Integrated online booking and secure payments
  • Photo galleries showcasing destinations
  • Contact and inquiry forms for personalized assistance
  • Fully responsive design for mobile and desktop

title: Travel Website
shortDescription: Elegant guest house website with online booking and gallery for Pursukoon Villa.
description:
The Pursukoon Villa website offers a tranquil digital experience reflecting the serene charm of the guest house. Key features include:

  • Room listings with descriptions, amenities, and pricing
  • Online booking system with calendar availability
  • High-resolution image gallery of the property
  • Contact form for inquiries and reservations
  • Responsive design for mobile and desktop users

title: Institute Website
shortDescription: Informative and engaging NGO website for WCW Society with donation and volunteer features.
description:
The WCW Society website was designed to support the organization's mission of social welfare and community development. Key features include:

  • Overview of ongoing projects and initiatives
  • Online donation system with secure payment integration
  • Volunteer registration and contact forms
  • Blog section for news and updates
  • Responsive design compatible with all devices

title: Social Content Plateform
shortDescription: A student-focused platform for sharing MCQs, study materials, and building academic communities.
description:
The Tech Hive is an educational and social platform created to support students through collaborative learning and resource sharing. Key features include:

  • Regularly updated MCQ materials across various subjects
  • Study notes, PDFs, and downloadable content
  • Student discussion forums and community support
  • Join and follow features to stay updated with new content
  • Mobile-friendly and easy-to-navigate interface
